extracted_playbook.title: Verify Update Packet Hashes
extracted_playbook.description: Check the hashes of the update packet and ensure they match the original. Do not use update files with different hashes.

extracted_playbook.title: Follow WAGO's Cyber Security Handbook
extracted_playbook.description: Follow the instructions provided in WAGO's handbook on Cyber Security for Controller.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict network access to the device and avoid direct internet connections.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Encrypted VPN Connection
extracted_playbook.description: Use an encrypted VPN connection to access the device.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unused TCP/UDP Ports
extracted_playbook.description: Disable any unused TCP/UDP ports on the device to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Strong Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Use strong passwords for all user accounts, especially for administrative accounts on the device.

extracted_playbook.title: Complete Mitigation Process
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure all mitigation steps are completed and verify the security of the device.
